initial_question.title: 主线程卡死
initial_question.body:
您好,请问我执行该解压后,会导致解压期间主线程卡死,是必须要异步执行该方法么?
[SSZipArchive unzipFileAtPath:downloadPath toDestination:destinationPath overwrite:YES password:nil error:&error delegate:self]

satisfaction_conditions: Main thread remains responsive during decompression
UI updates occur on the main thread
Results are properly communicated back after completion

initial_question.title: when swift4.0 support?
initial_question.body: I build my project in Xcode9.0 ,swit4.0, show the error: Module complied with swift3.1 cannot be imported in swift 4.0

satisfaction_conditions: Swift version compatibility issue is resolved
Project successfully builds in Xcode 9 with Swift 4.0
